description.0: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

0.0: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>14%</cryo>.

1.0: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>17.5%</cryo>.

2.0: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>21%</cryo>.

3.0: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>24.5%</cryo>.

4.0: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>28%</cryo>.
